changeSet.sql: WITH series AS (SELECT GENERATE_SERIES(1, 1000) sery) INSERT INTO orders (order_status, created_at_utc, completed_at_utc) SELECT CASE WHEN s.sery % 4 = 0 THEN 'PROCESSING'::order_status_enum WHEN s.sery % 3 = 0 THEN 'COMPLETED'::order_status_enum ELSE 'CREATED'::order_status_enum END, NOW() - FLOOR((RANDOM() * (1000 - 500) + 500)) * INTERVAL '1 day', NOW() - FLOOR((RANDOM() * (499 - 1) + 1)) * INTERVAL '1 day' FROM series s
